Package ptolemy.domains.modal.modal

Class ModalRefinement

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, ptolemy.actor.Actor, ptolemy.actor.Executable, ptolemy.actor.FiringsRecordable, ptolemy.actor.Initializable, ptolemy.actor.TypedActor, RefinementActor, ptolemy.kernel.util.Changeable, ptolemy.kernel.util.ChangeListener, ptolemy.kernel.util.Debuggable, ptolemy.kernel.util.DebugListener, ptolemy.kernel.util.Derivable, ptolemy.kernel.util.DropTargetHandler, ptolemy.kernel.util.Instantiable, ptolemy.kernel.util.ModelErrorHandler, ptolemy.kernel.util.MoMLExportable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Moveable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Nameable
public class ModalRefinement
extends ModalModel
implements ptolemy.kernel.util.DropTargetHandler, RefinementActor
This modal model actor supports mirroring of its ports in its container (which is required to be a refinement of a state in a ModalModel). This in turn assures mirroring of ports in each of the refinements.

Note that this actor has no attributes of its own. Requests for attributes are delegated to the container.

Since:
Ptolemy II 8.0
Version:
$Id: ModalRefinement.java 57046 2010-01-27 23:35:53Z cxh $
Author:
Edward A. Lee

    • _mirrorDisable

      protected int _mirrorDisable
      Indicator that we are processing a newPort request from above (if 1) or below (if -1) in the hierarchy.

  • Constructor Details

    • ModalRefinement

      public ModalRefinement​(ptolemy.kernel.CompositeEntity container, java.lang.String name) throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException, ptolemy.kernel.util.NameDuplicationException
      Construct a modal controller with a name and a container. The container argument must not be null, or a NullPointerException will be thrown.
      Parameters:
      container - The container.
      name - The name of this actor.
      Throws:
      ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - If the container is incompatible with this actor.
      ptolemy.kernel.util.NameDuplicationException - If the name coincides with an actor already in the container.

  • Method Details

    • dropObject

      public void dropObject​(ptolemy.kernel.util.NamedObj target, java.util.List dropObjects, java.lang.String moml) throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
      React to a list of objects being dropped onto a target.
      Specified by:
      dropObject in interface ptolemy.kernel.util.DropTargetHandler
      Parameters:
      target - The target on which the objects are dropped.
      dropObjects - The list of objects dropped onto the target.
      moml - The moml string generated for the dropped objects.
      Throws:
      ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - If the handling is unsuccessful.

    • getRefinedState

      public State getRefinedState() throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
      Get the state in any ModalRefinement within this ModalModel that has this ModalRefinement as its refinement, if any. Return null if no such state is found.
      Specified by:
      getRefinedState in interface RefinementActor
      Returns:
      The state with this ModalRefinement as its refinement, or null.
      Throws:
      ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - If the specified refinement cannot be found in a state, or if a comma-separated list is malformed.

    • newPort

      public ptolemy.kernel.Port newPort​(java.lang.String name) throws ptolemy.kernel.util.NameDuplicationException
      Create a new port with the specified name in the container of this controller, which in turn creates a port in this controller and all the refinements. This method is write-synchronized on the workspace.
      Overrides:
      newPort in class ModalModel
      Parameters:
      name - The name to assign to the newly created port.
      Returns:
      The new port.
      Throws:
      ptolemy.kernel.util.NameDuplicationException - If the entity already has a port with the specified name.

    • setMirrorDisable

      public void setMirrorDisable​(int disable)
      Control whether adding a port should be mirrored in the modal model and refinements. This is added to allow control by the UI.
      Specified by:
      setMirrorDisable in interface RefinementActor
      Parameters:
      disable - 0 if mirroring should occur, -1 if mirroring should not occur downwards in the hierarchy, 1 if mirroring should not occur upwards in the hierarchy.

    • _checkContainer

      protected void _checkContainer​(ptolemy.kernel.Entity container) throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
      Override the base class to ensure that the proposed container is a ModalModel or null.
      Parameters:
      container - The proposed container.
      Throws:
      ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - If the proposed container is not a TypedActor, or if the base class throws it.

    • _getRefinementClasses

      protected java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Class<? extends ptolemy.kernel.Entity>,​java.lang.String> _getRefinementClasses()
      Return a map from the classes of the entities to be dropped into a state and the class names of the refinements that can be used to contain those entities.
      Returns:
      The map.

    • addRefinement

      public void addRefinement​(State state, java.lang.String name, ptolemy.kernel.Entity template, java.lang.String className, Configuration configuration) throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException
      Create a refinement for the given state.
      Specified by:
      addRefinement in interface RefinementActor
      Parameters:
      state - The state that will contain the new refinement.
      name - The name of the composite entity that stores the refinement.
      template - The template used to create the refinement, or null if template is not used.
      className - The class name for the refinement, which is used when template is null.
      configuration - The configuration that is used to open the refinement (as a look-inside action) after it is created, or null if it is not needed to open the refinement.
      Throws:
      ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - If error occurs while creating the refinement.
